definition: to suppress smugglers/to search for smuggled goods

sentences.english: At present, the case has been transferred to the anti-smuggling department for further processing.
sentences.chinese: 目前，此案件已移交緝私部門做進一步處理。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the driving construction technology of concrete sheet pile in Beihai Customs Suppress Smuggling Wharf engineering.
sentences.chinese: 簡述北海海關緝私碼頭工程混凝土板樁沉樁施工工藝。

sentences.english: The coastguard cutter cruised along the coast looking for smugglers.
sentences.chinese: 水上警察緝私船沿海巡邏搜尋走私犯。

sentences.english: Face this bone that gnaws hard, police of custom suppress smuggling spreads out meticulous investigation.
sentences.chinese: 面對這塊難啃的骨頭，海關緝私警察展開細緻的偵查。

sentences.english: Chinese anti-smuggling ship detained a Taiwanese fishing vessel.
sentences.chinese: 大陸緝私艦扣押臺籍漁船。

sentences.english: To be responsible for the daily fiscal accounting of the Customs Office and the Anti-smuggling Department of the Customs Office.
sentences.chinese: 負責總署機關及總署緝私局日常財務會計工作。

sentences.english: It becomes common duty for both central and local government to suppress smuggling.
sentences.chinese: 緝私作爲打擊走私的政府職能的重要性就不言而喻了。

sentences.english: To study and put forward regulations and rules for anti-smuggling information and organize implementation accordingly.
sentences.chinese: 研究提出緝私情報工作規章制度並組織實施。

sentences.english: The coastguard cutter cruise along the coast look for smuggler.
sentences.chinese: 海岸警衛隊緝私艇沿海巡邏搜尋走私犯。

definition: Taixi or Taihsi township in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan
to eliminate/to sack/to remove from office
sudden unannounced investigation/on-the-spot inspection/to search without notification
Kanting township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan

pinyin: Nei4 zheng4 bu4 Jing3 zheng4 shu3

definition: Shaoguan prefecture level city in Guangdong province
